TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 指定一个标准接口，用于从当前系统检索功能信息。

span.span: Specifies a standard interface for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中实现时提供了可以使用以确定系统上当前是否安装了一项功能并获取一项功能的版本号的方法。When implemented in a class, provides methods you can use to determine whether a feature is currently installed on the system and to get the version number of a feature. 调用以确定是否一项功能或特定版本的一项功能，当前安装。Call to determine whether a feature, or a specific version of a feature, is currently installed. 调用来确定已安装功能的版本号。Call to determine the version number of an installed feature. 请参阅和为此接口的实现的类。See the and classes for implementations of this interface. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的实现，将查询来功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本，以确定它是否`null`，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.
Retrieves the version of the specified feature.

returns.span: 表示指定功能的版本号的 ；如果该功能未安装，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例使用的实现，将查询来功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本，以确定它是否`null`，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. summary.span: 确定指定的功能在系统中当前是否可用。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is currently available on the system.

Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 确定系统当前是否有指定功能的任意版本。

span.span: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果提供该功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the feature is present; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用的实现，将查询来功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 检查版本，以确定它是否`null`，以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object, minimumVersion As Version) As Boolean
public: bool IsPresent(System::Object ^ feature, Version ^ minimumVersion);
abstract member IsPresent : obj * Version -> bool

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: 表示要查找功能的最小版本号。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 确定系统当前是否有指定功能的指定版本或更新版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果有所请求的该功能版本，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the requested version of the feature is present; otherwise, .
